# Clone an email template

You can create an email template with duplicated configuration by cloning an existing email template.

1.  Navigate to in the left navigation menu.
2.  Click the Email Templates tab.
3.  In the Email Templates sub-tab, locate the email template that you want to clone from the list.
4.  Click the more options icon ![More action icon](https://zuora.deploy.heretto.com/v4/deployments/QPAZk6lsgXwvotedNERE/object/9d293d31-4491-421c-b4d6-f5a49e5f13c3?jwt=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9..n9igB8Spq5xKLRW4_jlQVG-fECCxg4nni_Oig5Mm1cA) and then click Clone. The CloCne Email Template dialog opens.
5.  In the Name field, specify a unique name for the email template.
6.  (Optional) Update other fields as needed.
7.  Click Save.
